verses.text: Give ear \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w And|strong="H1732"\w* hide \w not|strong="H1732"\w* thyself from \w my|strong="H1732"\w* supplication.
Attend unto me, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* answer me: I am restless \w in|strong="H8467"\w* \w my|strong="H5956"\w* complaint, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* moan,

Because \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* voice \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* enemy, Because \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* oppression \w of|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* wicked; \w For|strong="H6030"\w* they cast iniquity upon \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H6030"\w* anger they persecute \w me|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H7563"\w* sore pained \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: \w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* terrors \w of|strong="H6963"\w* death \w are|strong="H7563"\w* fallen \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Fearfulness \w and|strong="H3820"\w* trembling \w are|strong="H4194"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w And|strong="H3820"\w* horror \w hath|strong="H3820"\w* \w overwhelmed|strong="H5307"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3374"\w* I said, Oh that I had wings like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dove! Then would I fly away, \w and|strong="H3374"\w* be at rest.

Lo, \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* wander far \w off|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* lodge \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness. \qs [Selah\qs*

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* would haste \w me|strong="H7368"\w* \w to|strong="H4057"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shelter \w From|strong="H7368"\w* \w the|strong="H3885"\w* stormy wind \w and|strong="H4057"\w* tempest.

Destroy, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \add and\add* divide their tongue; For I \w have|strong="H2363"\w* seen violence \w and|strong="H7307"\w* strife \w in|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H7307"\w* city.

Day \w and|strong="H5892"\w* night \w they|strong="H3588"\w* go \w about|strong="H5892"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* walls \w thereof|strong="H5892"\w*: Iniquity \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* mischief \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* midst \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Wickedness|strong="H5999"\w* \w is|strong="H7130"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w thereof|strong="H7130"\w*: Oppression \w and|strong="H3119"\w* guile depart not \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* streets.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* an enemy \w that|strong="H3808"\w* reproached \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* could \w have|strong="H3808"\w* borne \w it|strong="H3808"\w*: \w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* hated \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* magnify \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* against \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* would \w have|strong="H3808"\w* hid myself \w from|strong="H4185"\w* \w him|strong="H7130"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w mine|strong="H5375"\w* equal, \w My|strong="H5921"\w* companion, \w and|strong="H1431"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* familiar friend.

We \w took|strong="H3045"\w* sweet counsel together; We walked \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* house \w of|strong="H3045"\w* God \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* throng.

\w Let|strong="H1980"\w* death \w come|strong="H1980"\w* suddenly \w upon|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w*, \w Let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w* alive \w into|strong="H1980"\w* Sheol; \w For|strong="H1004"\w* wickedness \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H1980"\w* dwelling, \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* call \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w And|strong="H3381"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Evening, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* noonday, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* complain, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* moan; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w He|strong="H1242"\w* hath redeemed \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* battle \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*; \w For|strong="H1993"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* \w were|strong="H6963"\w* many \add that strove\add* \w with|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

God \w will|strong="H1961"\w* hear, \w and|strong="H7965"\w* answer \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* abideth \w of|strong="H5315"\w* old, \qs [Selah\qs* \add The men\add* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* changes, \w And|strong="H7965"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* fear \w not|strong="H1961"\w* God.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath put \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* hands \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w were|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* peace \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*: \w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath profaned \w his|strong="H8085"\w* covenant.

\w His|strong="H7971"\w* mouth \w was|strong="H3027"\w* smooth \w as|strong="H3027"\w* butter, But \w his|strong="H7971"\w* heart \w was|strong="H3027"\w* war: \w His|strong="H7971"\w* words \w were|strong="H3027"\w* softer than oil, \w Yet|strong="H7971"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* drawn swords.

Cast \w thy|strong="H8081"\w* burden \w upon|strong="H8081"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w he|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* sustain thee: \w He|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* never suffer \w the|strong="H1697"\w* righteous \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* moved.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, wilt \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* destruction: Bloodthirsty \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deceitful \w men|strong="H6662"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* live \w out|strong="H7993"\w* half \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w*; \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*.
